column3: was a Hobbits of the Shire.

column1: Linda was the fourth child of Mungo Baggins and Laura Grubb. She married Bodo Proudfoot and was the mother of Odo Proudfoot.
:Five portraits are clustered on a wall in Bag End. One of them is Linda
column2: and one of Bilbos lines when looking at the portraits is "Thats my aunt Linda when she was a child".
